name: LOOP link to Hatton Cross Underground

ai.summary: A compact urban loop connected to Hatton Cross Underground in the UK. At 0.4 km, this easy stroll weaves along sidewalks with a hint of green space, making it a quick stretch suitable for all ages between travels or for a brief outdoor pause near the transit hub.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly flat and paved, with sidewalks and minor grassy verges. Expect curb edges and occasional uneven paving; overall an easy urban surface suitable for most walkers.
ai.safety_notes: Urban setting: stay on sidewalks and use marked crossings. Be mindful of traffic, cyclists, and other pedestrians. Watch for uneven pavement, steps, and wet surfaces after rain. Plan around busy times near Hatton Cross station and Heathrow-area roads; carry a map or phone for detours; daylight helps; keep valuables secure and supervise children or mobility devices.
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with spring and autumn offering the most comfortable conditions. In winter, be prepared for cold, wind, and wet surfaces; in hot summer, go early or late to avoid heat.
